name: Aganorsa Leaf - La Validacion - Maduro - Gran Robusto
additionalNotes: Handmade in Miami, Florida, the Aganorsa Leaf Validacion (formerly known as Casa Fernandez Aganorsa) Maduro is a full-strength, flavorful premium cigar. It sports a dark, sweet Mexican San Andres maduro wrapper that covers a binder and filler made of premium Nicaraguan tobaccos. This potent stick is perfect for the experienced cigar lover. The cigars undergo a rigorous quality control process before they are finally released. They call it “validacion,” which is Spanish for validation or validating
